
An intern reused a prime when generating RSA keys. Can you recover the secret from the encrypted message below?
563563894583601578052982647869885482267347642683563510247856175297898126825176166089303252370012689958737865361479963607735180918832488488273870156090864701150221328543224566258985159852994830196305760027244972207051079217397490227


The flag format is flag{...}
n=735088037803013119187429067798245553880281393267945776739101082876053826788591911218912689636167206728367916149311814641434324318015690460091687385934796621783208346230809875033188771608142499828446431807353622724467113609930863729, e=371683691478314091303460872261917581738506402818595127268879566218914564694456936273286445941679463001543798400345050772170646367912833369900417200335805864390960856446626165721752263182052954186923586362992304383409084600117687597

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{8abxmnxm}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 563563894583601578052982647869885482267347642683563510247856175297898126825176166089303252370012689958737865361479963607735180918832488488273870156090864701150221328543224566258985159852994830196305760027244972207051079217397490227
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=735088037803013119187429067798245553880281393267945776739101082876053826788591911218912689636167206728367916149311814641434324318015690460091687385934796621783208346230809875033188771608142499828446431807353622724467113609930863729, e=371683691478314091303460872261917581738506402818595127268879566218914564694456936273286445941679463001543798400345050772170646367912833369900417200335805864390960856446626165721752263182052954186923586362992304383409084600117687597
extra_info: p=27112507036476968320503519832069166041234594823281936957257194563058370434150326917877692079452502175179619772309223, q=27112507036476968320503519832069166041234594823281936957257194563058370434150326917877692079452502175179619772309223, Ï†(n)=735088037803013119187429067798245553880281393267945776739101082876053826788591911218912689636167206728367916149311760416420251364079049453052023247602714152593561782356895360644062654867274199174610676423194717720116754370386245284
